alfredsnippet.snippet:
start=1
end=10
for ((i=start; i<=end; i++))
do
   echo "i: $i"
done

# example 2
# https://stackoverflow.com/questions/8880603/loop-through-an-array-of-strings-in-bash
%%bash
for i in numpy pandas plotly cufflinks ;
  do
    pip freeze | grep $i
  done

# example 3
for Item in Item1 \
            Item2 \
            Item3 \
            Item4
  do
    echo $Item
  done

# example 4
List=( Item1 Item2 Item3 )
for Item in ${List[*]} 
  do
    echo $Item 
  done
alfredsnippet.name: bash for loop
